data.what_is:
Trusted by over 500,000 businesses worldwide, Brevo (formerly Sendinblue) is the affordable, all-in-one marketing and CRM stack that helps growing businesses scale faster. It's easy to use and suitable for companies of all sizes. Build lasting customer relationships with Brevo's flexible toolkit. Products range from marketing to sales, chat, and transactional emails. Choose what you need -- and only pay for what you use.

Here are just some of the things you can do with Brevo:
- Run multi-channel marketing campaigns across email, WhatsApp, SMS, web push, and Facebook ads
- Trigger transactional emails, SMS, and WhatsApp notifications over Brevo SMTP and APIs
- Automate marketing activities to deliver the right message at the right time, and efficiently manage your audience 
- Reduce the number of marketing and sales apps -- and get a full view of customer interactions with tools that talk to each other
- Engage customers in real-time and reply to FAQs 24/7 with live chat and chatbot
- Track leads, automate tasks, and schedule meetings with the Brevo Sales Platform
- Connect your e-commerce store to track web sales and use the Retention analysis to improve your marketing strategy. 
- Talk to customers anytime, anywhere with Brevo's cloud-based phone system

Learn more and start for free at https://www.brevo.com/products/marketing-platform/
Get a custom quote: https://www.brevo.com/plus/contact/

initial_reviews.review_title: Excellent first experience with their support - Free account review.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Brevo Marketing Platform?
I've been using Brevo since its SendinBlue days, mainly for email marketing and SMTP relay with our office printer. So we use their service every day in that sense.

The transition to Brevo brought noticeable improvements. What stands out is their customer support - even as a free account user, I received personalized, non-canned responses to my queries. This prompt and considerate support, especially for minor issues like the SMTP key length for our printer, is commendable."

We don't use their integration tools/features, so I can't speak about those.

The fact that Brevo maintains such high-quality service even for free user accounts is commendable, making me confident in considering their paid services as our company grows.

What do you dislike about Brevo Marketing Platform?
There was a hiccup with the SMTP key (password) length not fitting our printer's specs (too long. 90 characters length but the printer only accepts 64), but that's more about the printer than Brevo. Their team suggested reaching out to the manufacturer, which was a reasonable step. Also explained that 90 is for security reasons which I also agree. I suggested to my support representative to suggest our use case to their marketing or development department and he seems much obliged to do it.

Aside from this, my experience has been mostly positive. No significant downsides to report.

What problems is Brevo Marketing Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Brevo's been a real time-saver for our email marketing and office tasks. It's easy to use for sending out emails, and even the free version does everything we need right now. This means less hassle with email campaigns, freeing us up to focus on more important stuff.

The SMTP feature for our office printer has been a small but significant help too - it's one less thing to worry about in our daily operations. And when we did hit a snag with the SMTP key and our printer, Brevo's support was quick and helpful, even for a free account. It's not just about solving a tech issue; it's knowing they're there to support us, which is a big deal for a growing business.

So if a contact becomes blocklisted for marketing emails there is really no way to make it active again apart from admin's manual involvement. For example, if a transactional mail will be sent to the user and they decide to subscribe again, there is no automation that could actually change the subscription status from blocklisted for that user. In general, subscription management could be improved as the only option for automations now is to unsubsribe per medium (sms/WA/email)

This made integration harder then it should be especially due to double opt-ins.

The free option of the platform gives access to many templates to start creating landing pages, 1 page websites, emails and more. It permits customisation with brand colours as well and is rather intuitive, which means that the software is made to accomodate people with little experience of digital marketing & communication and get them on board with the basics.

What do you dislike about Brevo Marketing Platform?
I regret that no help is readily available in real time as an online chat. I had to write an email to customer service with a pressing issue and because it was Friday and they were "abnormally busy", I had to wait until Monday to get an answer. The answer got me unstuck instantly, but I would have prefered interacting in real time with someone (NOT a bot as 99% of time they don't help) in real time.

What problems is Brevo Marketing Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
I find it a little bit easier to use than my WordPress website builder to build landing pages and get analytics, yet it is all integrated with WP.
I like the customisable templates that have been thought through for various specific needs (newsletters, shopping incentive, etc). It helps me get started with Design foundations already in place (as I am not a Designer, it saves me time and spares me errors I would make should I had to do this on my own and from scratch).

The SMTP feature for our office printer has been a small but significant help too - it's one less thing to worry about in our daily operations. And when we did hit a snag with the SMTP key and our printer, Brevo's support was quick and helpful, even for a free account. It's not just about solving a tech issue; it's knowing they're there to support us, which is a big deal for a growing business.

What do you like best about Brevo Marketing Platform?
It is a no code SaaS, so a platform hosted online (so no installation is required) giving you a lot of services that would normally require some HTML or CSS experience to say the least. The free option of the platform gives access to many templates to start creating landing pages, 1 page websites, emails and more. It permits customisation with brand colours as well and is rather intuitive, which means that the software is made to accomodate people with little experience of digital marketing & communication and get them on board with the basics.

What do you dislike about Brevo Marketing Platform?
I regret that no help is readily available in real time as an online chat. I had to write an email to customer service with a pressing issue and because it was Friday and they were "abnormally busy", I had to wait until Monday to get an answer. The answer got me unstuck instantly, but I would have prefered interacting in real time with someone (NOT a bot as 99% of time they don't help) in real time.

What problems is Brevo Marketing Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
I find it a little bit easier to use than my WordPress website builder to build landing pages and get analytics, yet it is all integrated with WP.
I like the customisable templates that have been thought through for various specific needs (newsletters, shopping incentive, etc). It helps me get started with Design foundations already in place (as I am not a Designer, it saves me time and spares me errors I would make should I had to do this on my own and from scratch).

I find it powerful, but not massively confusing and complex. They give you some good basic starters, but you can build from scratch as well. The layout designer works well.

I also find sendinblue support response very acceptable in regards to response time, They have not ignored my complaints, but at least acknowledged them, and then tried to help with the issue at hand I had emailed them about.

AWESOMENESS- They still offer great deals at Appsumo and other promotions to give people a really happy satisfied feeling of getting a premium product at a discounted price. Thier product from first beginnings (Think free Mautic) has become stronger, and I think they know that if buyers are given a chance to learn how to work the platform, and have a low price while getting past the learning curve, once they do learn the platform, they will see how powerful it is and stick with sendinblue.

ALL-in-ALL... I am very happy with my product purchase, and I think I got a great deal, with a highly valuable product. I'm Happy!

What do you dislike about Brevo Marketing Platform?
I find some of Sendinblue documentation lacking. EG: Domain, DKIM,DMARC, and other type complex or problematic setup issues. They do have documentation on this, but it is basic copy/paste "this should fix your issue." EG: I have a separate domain registrar, apart from my hosting...both have DNS editors. Which domain editor do I use? Then I got errors copying the recommended @ for the name field. Also, special attention has to be given and rechecked; pasting in values or pasting may not create spaces needed--issues like this where it happens to take days getting setup.
Would they take the time to be more clear? An in-detail, comprehensive guide or video would reduce call, email, and support tickets for what is, I'm sure a "Repetitive Problem or Question."
They are giving a quicker resolution for purchasers of their product and saving them support costs to deal with the same questions and detailed emails that a support document could resolve.

One other minor negative is after joining; you have to send a support request for transactional and automation requests as it appears disabled or not included by default. I'm not sure why they implement this additional hurdle for users. But I found it annoying that after registering, paying for products, going though setup that suddenly I get stopped at this point and have to re-contact support to get these features enabled.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Brevo Marketing Platform?
My favorite thing about Send in Blue is just how easy it has been to use. The reason I originally looking into Send In Blue was the straightforward pricing model that charges you based on emails sent. That makes sense to me, none of this complicated "how many contacts do you have +hidden fees." Once I got set up, it was simple and straightforward to embed an email signup and start managing my contacts. Creating an email is simple, straightforward and easy to use while also being pretty powerful. Most of the tools and information is easy to find, access and use. I originally switched to Send In Blue for my job, and now I am using it exclusively for my personal projects, because its just a no-brainer across the board.

What do you dislike about Brevo Marketing Platform?
My only complaint would be the email creation system. While it is intuitive and powerful, I think they could go further and provide more options and tools to make more complicated emails. That being said, this is FAR from a deal-breaker for me, and is at minimum on par with the other email services I have personally used.

Recommendations to others considering Brevo Marketing Platform:
If you are not sure, at least give it a try. There is a fantastic free trial where you can import all of your contacts and give the system a test drive. Unlike other Email services I have used you do not need to worry about getting charged while having a free account. If fall in love and decide to send more than 300 emails in one day, then you can upgrade and get all the Send In Blue Features. (This was the free trial limit at the time of writing this review, as always go and check the details in case they changed.) I really recommend giving it a try, worst case its not for you.

What problems is Brevo Marketing Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
I think the answer to this question is pretty straightforward. For my own use I wanted to release a game beta I was creating and have people sign up with the ability to contact them regarding updates. While any email service could work in theory, Send In Blue has gone out of their way to help get me set up and lay the basic framework to make it easy and convenient to stay in contact with my new community. It has been really nice to have an email service that I do not feel like I am fighting with, and just simply works.

all_reviews.review_title: Easy To Use and Affordable Email Campaign Platform
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Brevo Marketing Platform?
Sendinblue Premium is a very easy to use email campaign platform.  On the low end of their subscription service, you are allotted 60,000 emails per month.  For an additional fee, you can also have your own dedicated IP so you do not have to use the IP pools for your email campaign.  Emails are easy to create (either drag and drop or rich text editor).   Contact lists are very easy to create.  Importing contacts take a few steps (if you have a lot of them) but is easy to do once you get the hang of it.  Sendinblue Premium provides real time statistics of your email campaign to include who opened, who did not, who unsubscribed, and who clicked any links within your email.  Bounced emails and recipients requesting to unsubscribed are automatically blacklisted so you do not have to do this manually.

What do you dislike about Brevo Marketing Platform?
I have nothing negative to say about this platform.  To date, I've completed 38 email campaigns through Sendinblue Premium and each one has been without issue.

Recommendations to others considering Brevo Marketing Platform:
This is definitely a platform worth trying if you are looking to start email campaign or change from your current email campaign platform.

What problems is Brevo Marketing Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were send out email campaigns manually via Microsoft Outlook.  This did not cost us any money, but was very tedious (especially with attachments) and tended to clog up our email server.

all_reviews.review_title: Working with Sendinblue from a Wordpress website
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Brevo Marketing Platform?
Sendinblue integrates very easily with Wordpress by using the WP Mail SMTP plugin, everything you need is an API Key from your Sendinblue registration and you are done.  We are using Sendinblue primarily for transactional emails, and doing this task they have succeeded with a very high deliverability. Their real-time statistics and other reports reports give us very valuable information about the status of the emails: sent, delivery, first opened, reopened, etc.  The campaigns are also ok, with fast delivery, simple upload of contacts for the campaign and email composer included. Their plans are also very affordable, we started with 300 emails/day with their free plan, and soon upgraded to Silver, which sends up to 120,000 emails/month. Highly recommended for small and mid-size companies, and for developers, both in website testing phase and in production.

What do you dislike about Brevo Marketing Platform?
We had a little trouble with the small quota (40 transactional emails/hour) initially assigned to our plan, and requested Sendinblue's technical service to help us raising the quota, and it seems that the solution is: either purchase a dedicated IP or upgrade to Gold Plan, which includes a free dedicated IP. That said, if you do not purchase one of these solutions and need to send more than 40 transactional emails/hour  instantly  (that is, without being queued) using the cheaper plans, you probably will not like this service. If you have many emails in the queue, the service will automatically raise the per-hour quota, and in the end will send them all (no email loss), but obviously the queued emails will not be sent instantly, as some of us require.

What problems is Brevo Marketing Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
For us, Sendinblue was a real lifesaver, since our server is hosted in GoDaddy and direct sending of emails from the server is very poor and introduces very big delays in the delivery (this is a well-known issue). With Sendinblue and WP Mail SMTP plugin, we got a very good workaround to the problem.

all_reviews.review_title: Great email marketing tool for SMB...Rob @ Cross
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Brevo Marketing Platform?
We were very impressed with SendinBlue 's feature set and what was available with the free options. We looked at Mailchimp, Constant Contact, and others before selecting this software. It is very easy to use, templates make it fast to get started and your campaign looks very professional. it also allows us to set up groups to prioritize certain types of customers (Computers sales, Server Maintenance, RMM software)  to narrow down mass emails to very specifics qualifications. Scheduling is accurate and we love the analytics included in the system.

What do you dislike about Brevo Marketing Platform?
The biggest downside is a very aggressive qualification process concerning importing emails. It did require several interactions with SendinBlue to get them to "approve" my list even though I was moving from another qualified source. I am sure it is for protection (We all hate Spammers!!)  but it can be a little frustrating.

Recommendations to others considering Brevo Marketing Platform:
I think this is the best option for SMB businesses getting started in this area of marketing. The feature set and pricing is much more in line with SMB than some of the other "well known" applications available.

What problems is Brevo Marketing Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Currently, we are not experiencing any problems or issues with the software. It is working as expected and we are very satisfied with our choice. The benefit is now we have a clear (and approved) source for communication with our customers. We are no longer struggling to maintain email addresses, trying to sort customers into groups, or sending out information and forgetting customers.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Brevo Marketing Platform?
SendinBlue is able to give a satisfactory answer to the challenge of automating email marketing through extensive functionalities such as automated marketing, transactional emails and landing pages. In the test that I have done with the free plan I could observe that the functionalities are quite complete and their automations are advanced in a well designed web page and with a control panel that will make you buy the program.

I think it is the marketing tool with the most refined administration and best design. We can notice this in the register, one of the simplest that exist, the same happens within the platform, everything is made easy and comfortable. Another difference is that you don't have to limit your contacts, this is the first thing that restricts the email marketing tools.

The campaigns in SendinBlue are easy to carry out thanks to the excellent design of the main board, it is very simple and pleasant. With regard to the creation of Newsletters as most tools has a drag-and-drop editor that while very basic, can get you out of trouble when it comes to modifying things at the last minute. In this editor I have experienced slowness in the browser Chrome but I have managed to solve it by changing browser or closing tabs.

The customization has conditional content similar to those found in Excel, for this you must know how to program a little this type of logic in conditional attributes. The concept is well applied and allows the realization of a dynamic content that can discern between what kind of emails to send to each client based on their behavior and tastes. This is also found in the automation of emails where we can define certain parameters such as contact details, interaction with emails and ecommerce activity. In this it is remarkable that only SendinBlue allows to send confirmations and receipts of purchase through SMTP.

The forms are advanced and you can customize them a lot, for example it is good to add Captcha verifications and pre-fill fields with the data of your customers when you send them forms through email with SendinBlue. Available in 5 languages and with a section of Reports and Analysis that does not need improvement at the moment because you can integrate it with Google Analytics. You can not ask for more features that you can get for free.

Finally it is important to note that Premium plans have a landing page editor very complete, stylish and robust. For this you must pay, the templates are nice and there are many to choose. I recommend to create them from scratch as well.

What do you dislike about Brevo Marketing Platform?
The big problem with SendinBlue is deliverability. The rates are bad and many emails end up in the spam folder of the big mail providers. But despite this it is a good option for how cheap it is.

And the customer service is deficient, I have heard of account deactivations for no reason, beyond these problems do not find that improve SendinBlue for its low price and great features, in any case you should try the free version and if it works you can buy premium versions.

With respect to the built-in editor this should be debugged because sometimes it gets stuck in the Chrome browser.

What problems is Brevo Marketing Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
SendinBlue is a tool easy to use, recommended for those who do not know design, the platform will facilitate the work, ideal for email campaigns and self response to help you save time. Before buying a paid version you should try the free version and try an example campaign.

What do you like best about Brevo Marketing Platform?
Sendinblue is an elegant platform, which puts all of the basic features in the most accessible places. The platform is stable and reliable, and customer service has been quick and efficient. We now have a full understanding of the platform and how we can deploy it, which will make building into our budget all the more easy.

I've found that with all email platforms, the drag and drop editor can be clunky when it comes to making sure that the styles are consistent across all of the text boxes. It's not difficult on this platform, but I've still found myself getting test emails with purple text.

Recommendations to others considering Brevo Marketing Platform:
This is a platform that is flexible. If you don't know what exactly you need from a product like this, Sendinblue is easy to set up and use in such a way that you can explore which features are right for you without investing your entire marketing budget.

Uno de los factores clave de esta herramienta online de email marketing es la posibilidad de enviar hasta 9000 emails al mes de forma totalmente gratuita. Ademas permite a sus usuarios realizar el seguimiento o tracking de las campanas de email marketing programadas asi como de los emails transaccionales. Otro factor positivo para la utilizacion de esta herramienta es el gran abanico de plantillas de diseno gratuitas al alcance de todas que, ademas, estan disenadas de forma totalmente responsive; lo cual quiere decir que se adaptaran en todo momento a la pantalla del dispositivo en el que se esta abriendo el email.

What do you dislike about Brevo Marketing Platform?
Principalmente la dificultad para integrar esta herramientas con otras herramientas del sector o con otros software de terceros. Al contrario que Mailchimp, que es la herramienta mas extendida del mercado actualmente en cuanto a email marketing y marketing online transaccional, SendinBlue aun no esta lo suficientemente extendida para lograr que otros software desarrollen sus productos para aceptar la compatibilidad con este. Tampoco nos da la opcion de crear newsletter de tipo Doble Optin en el cual la persona ratifica el deseo de recibir publicidad de los temas de interes por parte de nuestra compania.

What problems is Brevo Marketing Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?

De esta forma permite crear una conexion empresa-cliente a traves de la cual interactuar con nuestra audiencia realizando acciones de promocion y fidelizacion de forma mucho mas comoda, sencilla, eficaz y, ademas, medible. Podremos crear facilmente correos electronicos atractivos gracias a su sencillo disenador basado en arrastrar y soltar elemntos, ademas de proporcionarnos una amplia seleccion de plantillas totalmente responsive. Enviamos nuestros correos electronicos perfectamente disenados y programados a las personas adecuadas gracias a la herramienta de creacion de campanas pudiendo asi maximizar el retorno de la inversion (ROI) ademas de analizarlos a traves de sus informes. Todo ello de forma totalmente gratuita para una PYME y, en caso de ampliacion del negocio, posibilidad de ampliar el plan a precios realmente economicos.

So, like myself, you may literally spend hours and hours of your valuable time setting up contact lists and designing your first template....only to be told NO THANK YOU, your contact list is no good!  This company is not being honest about the backward way they operate.   If contact lists will be scrutinized and turned down, then Send in Blue needs to put blatant warning signs advising of the pitfalls of their ways.   Absolutely terrible way of doing business, shame on you Send in Blue.

The backwards way this company does things is just wrong.  Fair warning people, they will literally send you an email saying, no thanks, we will pass on you, sorry.  This company is not being honest about their procedures, they need to advise with large warning signs that your contact list can be turned down after hours of your advance design work.

What problems is Brevo Marketing Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Brevo Marketing Platform?
The features that Sendinblue touts as having, and supporting, are definitely awesome.

The GUI interface for builing marketing email automation workflows looks impressive on the website and in the demo material.

I was really hopeful and excited that this platform was going to allow us to manage our email automations much more easily, with it's API features and robust triggering system.

What do you dislike about Brevo Marketing Platform?
My experiences with this platform are mostly centered around the Automation and API features, with some additional limited experience with the one-off Campaign features.

Starting with the Automation features, I experienced many time-delays between when events were triggered via the javascript API and when the platform actually recognized those events being triggered. This led to a lot of wasted time, and frustration, trying to test and execute different Automation Workflows, as you couldn't rely on the interface or platform response as accurately reflecting the current state of your users within the workflow.

Additionally with the Automation features, I tried for several hours to kick-off an automation to a list of contact I was importing via CSV. Between importing the users, copying or moving them from one list to another, triggering events for each user individually (which needed programmer intervention to make happen), I could not get the automation to start for pre-existing users. This is a major problem as we're testing migrating from a different platform and already have a list segment that we wanted to try out this Automation platform with.

Moving on to the API, the "standard" API (that manages Campaigns, Lists, and Users) seems to be managed completely separately from the Automation API. There are different API keys for both, and different server-side API libraries for both. This makes the platform feel incredibly amateur and poorly integrated from a user's perspective.

Furthermore, the documentation for the API leaves a lot to be desired. There are rudimentary examples for each endpoint with little explanation and description for each. The primary language of the documentation author(s) is obviously not english, which makes the documentation that much more difficult to understand and refer to. There is no technical level of documentation on the API, which makes it very hard to write integration code to really make the most of your lists.

Regarding the Campaign features, there is a *ton* of confusion everywhere in the platform with scheduling. There is no indication of which timezone any of the timestamps are reported in, other than the setting to configure your own timezone for your account. Unfortunately, there is no prompt or notification for you to set your own timezone, and you just have to find it on your own. This causes major issues with campaign scheduling and deliverability, and it's really tough to discern whether a campaign failed to send due to a scheduling timezone issue, or a platform stability issue (see delays mentioned above).

Lastly, the entire user interface is incredibly confusing and clunky. The Automation Workflow configuration is about the only interface that is intuitive, but it still needs a lot of improvement. For a platform that claims to be as prestigious, reliable, and stable as Sendinblue does, they clearly do not prioritize user interface design or working to improve the learning curve required to help their users make the most out of their platform by investing in the user interface.

The features that are offered by Sendinblue are definitely top-notch. Unfortunately, however, the execution of those features is very poor, which makes them, in my own opinion, a middle of the road platform. There are many other options available that may not offer the same feature parity of Sendinblue, but the features they do offer are rock solid and the support they offer is top notch.

Unfortunately, I absolutely can not recommend Sendinblue as a first-choice for sending emails. I wish that wasn't the case, as I really wanted to like their platform and tried to champion it, and work around the shortcomings. However, at this point, we've wasted days trying to "trick" the platform into doing things it claims to support out of the box. It's time to move on.

Recommendations to others considering Brevo Marketing Platform:
Be prepared for a steep learning curve, and a lot of confusion and frustration, as you try to learn how the nuances of this platform and how to navigate the minefield of broken or poorly documented features.

What problems is Brevo Marketing Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
I'm sending marketing emails to users who have exhibited interest with my product, and have engaged with me in recent history. I'm attempting to get them to re-engage and convert them to buyers by sending them targeted marketing emails. To provide a pleasant experience, I want to end the email campaign when they convert into a lead, or take some other action with me.

Sendinblue claims to have the features to do this, and if they worked - I think the platform would be a slam dunk. It's unfortunate that they're not working as advertised.
